description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Table Soccer X gives a very realistic experience of playing foosball. You can play with or against your friends, against the computer A.I. or play a single player game where you play against stronger and stronger computer opponents.
